tracks.text: Our view moves across white sand dunes
A cowboy in black sits on a horse, looking down between the dunes. There, a woman lies in a pink robe by a broken bicycle and a spilled bag of pomegranates.
The woman, Lady Gaga, has blue hair, a pink and white robe, and a red mask covering the top half of her face.
She sits up and looks around. The cowboy spurs the horse. Gaga looks up at the him.
She stands, and follows the figure on the horse as they walk away.
She walks across the white sand. Her mask drops.
The horse walks under an archway, entering a town characteristic of the American Southwest.
Gaga looks around at the white facade buildings.
A curly haired man thumps his head against a red, velvet pillow.
A black woman in a blue velvet and white linen outfit stare at her from behind.
Gaga stands within a window made of several lattice patterns, held by blindfolded men in orange robes. Their tall hats read IX I I.
Gaga holds up a white gloved hand.
She turns around, crossing her arms over her chest. The thumping man continues.
A crying woman in a purple robe holds a mummy in her arms.
Near the purple woman, a man in orange stirs a cauldron. Behind them are 3 watchers in blue.
The woman in purple cradles the mummy, then looks over at Gaga with piercing eyes.
Gaga holds under jaw, lifts her head up, then drops it again.
The blue watchers look up. A muscular Persian man and a black woman in an ornate white robe stand on the roof. The Persian man holds a black tasseled parasol.
The blue watchers point a stick. The Persian man and Pope drift down. The Popen holds a bronze mirror and wears a red + on her chest.
The watchers points the stick down. The thumping man keeps thumping.
Gaga stands in the middle of them with outstretched arms. She holds a box above the thumping man, and a doll over the purple woman, below the blue watchers.
The Pope puts a silver blanket over the thumping man.
The Persian man places a hand on the mummy while the woman looks at it.
Gaga opens the box in her hand. It's empty. She puts the doll inside.
Wearing a blue, transparent, glittery dress. On her head, giant gold thorns stick out of her head, with red at the base.
She gestures to a small pool of water in the sand in front of her.
The Persian man stands next to a princely man covered in gold and black. An orange man man stands nearby, holding a green amphora.
The Persian man puts a shell over the mouth and nose of the princely man.
The Pope holds a mirror, reflecting light at Gaga. Gaga grabs her chest. The Persian man holds the shell away from the princely man.
Gaga rises into the air, wearing a green dress and holding a white flower. A gold circlet floats around her face.
She jerks to a stop, then looks down
Her ankle is tied to a rope. The Persian man, standing down on the ground, holds the other end.
The Pope uses the mirror to shine a light in Gaga's face
The Persian man jerks the rope. Our view falls towards him.
Gaga's scared face flashes for a second.
Gaga wears a red outfit and elaborate headdress. She puts a hand over her heart, and another hand over her mouth. The Pope and the Persian man approach her.
She gestures upward, and a red string dangles from her head to her wrist.
The Persian man bends down, wraps his hands around her ankle, then stands.
The Persian man opens his mouth, then moves in front of Gaga. She turns and walks away.
A blindfolded man in orange tosses red petals

A man in blue holds up a palm. The figure on the black horse rides forward, carrying a New Mexico state flag, an orange symbol on a yellow background.  Gaga walks in slow motion, red cloth flowing behind her. The Persian man runs after her, accompanied by men in orange.
On a wall, a painting depicts a damaged bicycle, spilled red fruit, a nurse and doctor, a damaged blue car, a fire truck, a movie theater, a helicopter
Gaga, in yellow, holds out a hand and vibrates it.
The Persian man stands and holds Gaga's chest. Her hands vibrate. She shakes her head.
He wears a ring with 3 X's on his middle finger.
She turns and looks away. Next to her is a black costume covered in painted flowers.
In a dark room, she stands in the black costume next to the pope. Behind her is a yellow ribbon with Armenian text.
The Pope kneels, holding the mirror.
The Persian man approaches with a brown box. 2 men in orange bring a gold, human sized board covered in hand holds.
Gaga spreads her arms and turns away. The Persian man hands the box to the pope.
The black backdrop falls, revealing the white building behind her.
The woman in white opens the box, revealing a pair of objects
In a cramped room, Gaga stands next to the backboard. She has blood on her face, and watches the Persian man pick up the objects.
The purple robed woman holds her hand out, as do the orange men, the princely man, the thumping man, the cowboy in black sitting on a carousel horse, and the blue watchers with the stick.
Gaga's face falls, and she screams and cries.
The Persian man places the pair of objects over Gaga's chest. The Pope closes the box.
A Persian nurse hold Gaga, while a black woman in a white doctor's coat shines a flashlight in Gaga's face. A man wrapped in a silver blanket lies against an airbag.
Movie poster for The Colour of Pomegranates. Firefighter on a ladder under a sparks. Armenian Film Festival. Police hold flares. A helicopter with a red cross. Bicycle over turned near red fruit.
A digital sign shows a black cowboy on a horse. Text reads, White Sands National Park, New Mexico.
Firefighters carry a blue car door away while a woman watches from behind yellow caution tape. Onlookers lift a selfie stick. A woman in purple hold a man's head and cries.
Firefighters stand around a man dressed in gold next to a shiny, expensive car.
A fire hydrant shoots water into the air creating a puddle in the street.
The digital sign shows LG. Life's Good.
Gaga lies on the road, in the middle of the scene.
Cut to black.
